events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred yesterday afternoon at the downtown intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident following the submission of preliminary accident details.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the vehicle collision claim and contact the customer.
A confirmation email was sent to the customer confirming receipt and acknowledgment of their claim.
Additional documents including police report and photos of the damaged vehicle were requested from the claimant.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the accident report and multiple car damage photos.
The investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision and liability began promptly.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the claimant was not at fault for the car accident.
A settlement offer was proposed to the claimant covering repair costs and rental vehicle reimbursement.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and responsiveness of claim handling.
Final approval was granted for the claim and the settlement amount was confirmed for payment.
Payment was processed and issued to the customer's designated account for vehicle repairs.
The claim was officially closed after payment and all related processes were completed successfully.
